pr_title: [BEAM-11132] Remove Experimental annotation from SDF related APIs.

timeline.message: Remove Experimental annotation from SDF related APIs.

timeline.bodyText: nit: {@link DoFn} or even better if there is a subsection of the Javadoc that is best to read.
timeline.author: kennknowles
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -652,9 +652,8 @@ * interval, until the given termination condition is reached. The returned {@link PCollection} * is unbounded. * - *

This works only in runners supporting {@link Kind#SPLITTABLE_DO_FN}. + *

This works only in runners supporting splittable DoFn.

replies.bodyText: Thanks, good point on opening a thread on the dev list. I'll start one.
replies.author: boyuanzz

replies.bodyText: Added DoFn link to the javadoc
replies.author: boyuanzz

replies.bodyText: I'll go and merge this PR next Monday if there is no explicit -1 on the dev list.
replies.author: boyuanzz
